definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: The woman's beauty made her a rare bird indeed.
sentences.chinese: 美貌確實使她成了一個絕世佳人。

sentences.english: Thy beauty and thy years full well befits.
sentences.chinese: 你的美貌與年齡總相宜。

sentences.english: Corellon Unaligned Arcane magic, spring, beauty, the arts.
sentences.chinese: 科瑞隆無陣營奧法，春季，美貌，藝術。

sentences.english: Like a gold ring in a pigs snout is a beautiful woman without discretion.
sentences.chinese: 婦女美貌而無見識，如同金環戴在豬鼻上。

sentences.english: She has the beauty that beggars description.
sentences.chinese: 她的美貌絕非筆墨所能形容。

sentences.english: Beauty is only skin-deep but ugly goes to the bone.
sentences.chinese: 美貌只是一層皮，而醜陋會深入骨髓。

sentences.english: People were all shocked at her godlike beauty.
sentences.chinese: 所有人都驚歎於她天仙般的美貌。

sentences.english: Belles and beaux philandered in the hotels.
sentences.chinese: 美貌女子和花花公子在旅館裏調情。

sentences.english: The Emperor consented to send Zhaojun. While bidding farewell. the Emperor saw Zhaojun for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 在臨行辭別的時候，元帝才首次見到昭君的美貌。

sentences.english: I dont know love yet had beauty and wealth, but grew up to become different.
sentences.chinese: 金惠珍曾擁有美貌和財富，但長大後卻變得截然不同。

sentences.english: They were stunned by her beauty.
sentences.chinese: 他們看到她的美貌不禁目瞪囗呆。

sentences.english: Like a gold ring in a pig's snout is a beautiful woman without good sense.
sentences.chinese: 婦人美貌而無見識，如同金環戴在豬鼻上。

sentences.english: Nature has dowered her with both beauty and brains.
sentences.chinese: 大自然賦予她美貌與智能。

sentences.english: But beauty gives you something extra to look at.
sentences.chinese: 可是美貌給予你更多的可看性。

sentences.english: Which female teachers young and beautiful I have it?
sentences.chinese: 哪個女教師有我年輕美貌嗎？

definition: lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
lit. countenance of a flower, face like the moon (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) beautiful
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
(of a woman) lovely as a flower (idiom)/beautiful
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
